name: I am the way the truth and the life

metadata.name: angels crossing the sky
metadata.description:
First piece from the collection "I am the way, the truth and the life", inspired by the verse John 14:6 from the christian bible.

For years I have dreamed of these angels and lights crossing the sky. As a child I was raised in the Pentecostal Church in Brazil, and now I understand how this changed my imagination. Working to mend my childhood traumas is a difficult task, but I am on my way.
